questionTitle: He stood on one leg, ________ against the wall, while he took off his shoe.
________ of all of us who are here tonight, I would like to thank Mr Jones for his talk.
It was a complete ________; I never meant to hurt her!
When I was in the hotel my money ________.
________ to an accident in the High Street, traffic is moving very slowly on the London Road.
I am going to have a short rest as I ________ a headache.
Wild ducks always fly in a definite ________.
There was a robbery at the bank, and the police are looking ________ the matter.
I'm not sure how old he is but he must be ________ for 70.
The sky is ________ so I don't think it will rain.
It tasted so ________ of lemon that the other flavours were lost.
I am not in the least ________ about his opinion.
Whenever you go to the sales, you ________ your money buying things that nobody wants.
Paris lies ________ the river Seine.
At the end of the day we watch a little television ________ going to bed.
Mr Handforth could have continued working until he was 65, but he decided to ________ early.
It is obvious to everyone that he is not responsible ________ this mistake.
The sergeant's orders were perfectly ________.
She's obviously going to get a top job soon. She's a real high ________.
The boy looks like his father and the girl takes ________ her mother.
